attributes.action: Stop the closure of popular music venues across the UK
attributes.background: Closure to the popular venue Store Street in Manchester and Antwerp Mansion as well as Mint Club, Canal Mills and Church in Leeds are amongst the many closures of rave venues in the UK, it’s killing the dance scene culture

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Local planning issues are the responsibility of local councils.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them: 

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
